name: Glasshouse (CityStream)
description:
INTRODUCTION

ONE DAY I WAS CAUGHT UP IN A SNOWSTORM WHEN I WAS TRAVELING.

AFTER FALLING INTO A FREEZING POND AND GETTING ALL WET, I WAS HUNGRY AND FREEZING.

AT THAT MOMENT, I FOUND A HOUSE OUT OF NOWHERE IN THE FOREST.

DESPERATELY IN NEED TO SAVE MYSELF, I APPROACHED THE HOUSE AND OPENED THE DOOR - 

GAMEPLAY

AN ADVENTURE NARRATIVE GAME WITH SLIGHT HORROR ELEMENTS. PLAYERS WILL PLAY THE ROLE OF A TRAVELER CAUGHT UP IN A SNOWSTORM, EXPLORE THE GLASSHOUSE, AND UNCOVER THE SECRETS OF THE OWNER.

PLEASE USE ESC TO OPEN THE MENU AND SEE FURTHER INSTRUCTIONS ON GAMEPLAY. THE GAME HAS THREE ENDINGS.

NOTE: AFTER YOU REACH ONE ENDING, PLEASE USE ESC TO EXIT TO THE TITLE.

SOMETIMES THE SENSOR IS NOT THAT SENSITIVE; PLEASE TRY GETTING CLOSER OR FURTHER FROM THE OBJECT, OR DUCK DOWN (PRESS C) TO GET IT.

PLATFORM

PRODUCTION ENGINE: UNITY

PLATFORM: PC (WINDOWS/MAC)

LANGUAGE: ENGLISH
